Description: Ethical and reliable Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions.
Full Description: Arculi is a revolutionary Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions provider that highlights emerging security threats and shares early observations on potential remediation through a centralized database, state-of-the-art algorithms, and all-in-one technologies. Arculi collects data to make a difference, analyzes information for humankind, and deploys Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions to predict the future and build a better tomorrow. Arculi aims to use a scientifically intelligent imagination to develop revolutionary technologies and provide the world's ethical and most reliable Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions. Arculi offers a wide range of technologies to establish well-defined identities and patterned behavior, such as Identity Recognition, Text-To-Identity, Speech-To-Identity, Location Detection, Mental Health Detection, Smart Assistant, and Dynamic Translation. Arculi Identity Recognition technology captures publicly available data and provides detailed analysis to identify key risk indicators. The technology is capable of restructuring the raw data that shapes people's identities and converting it into detailed information to help our clients in the decision-making process. Arculi Text-To-Identity and Speech-To-Identity solutions can establish individuals' identity, social background, country of origin, ethnicity, education level, and precise location, in addition to mental health illnesses. Arculi Location detection technology predicts individuals' precise location from text, speech, and audio. Arculi Mental Health detection technology identifies mental health illnesses from text, speech, and audio. Arculi Smart Assistant technology provides high accuracy through Multilingual Language Algorithm to counter organized crime, motor vehicle theft, Driving Under the Influence (DUI), and automotive-related crimes. Arculi Dynamic Translation technology provides high reliability through Multilingual Neural Machine Translation. The technology identifies slang words and dialects commonly used by individuals associated with organized crime.

Description: Crowdsourced ordinance violation reporting app
Full Description: Government App Solutions, Inc. prides itself on being a mobile app that provides the people with a true distracted driving enforcement platform. We help municipalities enforce texting and driving violations with the goal of lowering the death and injury rates caused by incidents.   Our platform provides an iOS and Android mobile application to users (public and local government) which they use to submit videos of distracted drivers. This will aid cities in reducing the amount of cell phone use while driving and improve community, driver, and pedestrian safety. Our company works closely with local law enforcement and county traffic courts and we provide them with everything needed to efficiently issue tickets and enforce them.   Our primary business focus is increasing road safety by ONLY allowing and accepting videos to be submitted by passengers and pedestrians. Our app’s technology automatically tracks the user’s location, time, date, route and other necessary information needed to issue and enforce tickets. Once the user records the violation (a video clip of the violation and the violator's license plate) it is encrypted and sent securely to our servers where it is digitally signed to prevent tampering. Videos are reviewed and the ticket can be issued once approved by local law enforcement.   In summary, Government App Solutions is the first application and technology platform of its kind. We are the only provider of such a product and we are committed to reducing the prevalence of distracted driving. Since launch, local governments have asked us to expand our services to include vertical industries such as parking and code enforcement. We have been endorsed by State Representatives/Legislators, Mayors, Law Enforcement Agencies and even government agencies throughout the nation.
Headquarters Regions: West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Government and Military, Transportation

Description: Kamoto.AI empowers celebrities, influencers, and users to create, train, and monetize bespoke AI Character
Full Description: Kamoto.AI is a SaaS platform that revolutionizes the way people interact with AI chatbots, celebrities, and influencers. Kamoto.AI provides an unprecedented opportunity for users to create and train their own virtual AI characters or digital clone. This not only allows for a uniquely customizable AI experience but also opens up a new avenue for monetization. Users can share these personalized AI characters with others on a rental basis, creating a dynamic marketplace of AI Persona In a world that's increasingly fascinated by celebrity culture and influenced by social media personalities,Our product is limited only to creating digital clones but at the same time you can talk to your favorite AI character and personalities. Kamoto.AI takes it a step further. Celebrities and influencers can license their authorized AI personalities on their platform. These AI replicas are trained using structured data provided by the celebrities themselves, ensuring an authentic and truly representative AI version of their persona. This provides fans and followers with an exciting and intimate mode of interaction, never seen before. Moreover, celebrities and influencers stand to benefit from this innovative model. Every usage of their licensed AI character generates a commission for them, thereby opening up a new and engaging revenue stream. Kamoto.AI's capabilities don't just stop at individual users and celebrities. Kamoto.AI offers these AI personas as an API for seamless integration into other applications like telegram bots, mobile apps, etc. This opens up incredible possibilities for developers and companies who wish to offer their users the authentic experience of interacting with celebrities and influencers. Imagine a fitness app guided by your favorite athlete's AI, or a language learning app featuring your favorite author's AI - the possibilities are endless. Kamoto.AI is on a mission to redefine the landscape of AI, celebrity culture, and social influence. By creating a symbiotic ecosystem of users, celebrities, influencers, and developers, Kamoto.AI is taking a leap into the future of digital interaction and monetization. Kamoto.AI is not just building an AI platform, it is creating a new digital universe where everyone can interact, innovate, and earn.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast

Description: Good Party is building free tools and a movement so good, independent candidates can win, because BOTH Red + Blue are corrupt beyond repair.
Full Description: Our democracy has been corrupted by a two-party system that serves moneyed interests, leaving the people to choose between the lesser of two evils.  So, important issues continue to go unaddressed. Whether you’re concerned about the climate, privacy, inequality, or our individual freedoms, all are blocked by dysfunctional politics. A majority of eligible voters (over 130M Americans), including more than 50% of Millennials and Gen Z, feel like the two-party system isn’t representing them.  Good Party is building free, open-source tools to marshal the creative community and mobilize digital natives to vote differently. Our technology and movement will help independent, grassroots candidates from across the political spectrum have a real chance of running and winning elections, for the first time in modern history!  Good Party is founded by serial entrepreneur, Farhad Mohit (farhadmohit.com), with over $1B in exits — Flipagram (now TikTok), Shopzilla, and BizRate. If you're talented, passionate about democracy and looking to get in on the ground floor of something that could truly change the world for good, ping us: hi@goodparty.org Check us out at www.goodparty.org and on TikTok @goodparty

Description: Decentralized OTT for Creators to broadcast to distribute, engage and monetize new audiences like never before with blockchain technology.
Full Description: Purple Squirrel is a protocol designed for creators and platforms to create membership experiences. Purple Squirrel’s goal is to easily implement and dramatically increase user experiences from “users” to “members,” creating a much healthier monetization environment for the web.  There are several interdependent components of Purple Squirrel.  These are:  ● Purple Squirrel Labs:  The core team that created and currently maintains Purple Squirrel Protocol.  ● Purple Squirrel Protocol:  A suite of upgradable smart contracts that create memberships as NFTs.  ● The Purple Squirrel Network:  A community of creators, distributors, and consumers who share ownership of Purple Squirrel Protocol through their contributions using the protocol.  ● Purple Squirrel DAO: A decentralized organization of token holders who govern and control Purple Squirrel Protocol.  ● Purple Squirrel Toolbox:  Front-end convenience applications built by Purple Squirrel Labs to further sustainable innovation on Purple Squirrel Protocol.  Purple Squirrel Labs:  created Purple Squirrel Protocol to provide an open, shared infrastructure for memberships that removes friction, increases conversion, enables scale, reduces costs, and evolves the web from a business model built on attention toward one based on membership.  Purple Squirrel Protocol belongs to the Purple Squirrel Network,  not Purple Squirrel Labs and is governed by the Purple Squirrel DAO.  We aim for Purple Squirrel Protocol to be the primitive for every membership, both online and offline, around the globe. Together, we will create an internet owned and monetized by creators and their supporters.

Industry Groups: Apps, Information Technology, Internet Services, Mobile, Software

Description: Signum City is a fantasy stock market gaming app.
Full Description: Ever felt intimidated by the stock market? Buy and sell stocks risk-free in this colorful, interactive mobile game. No prior experience or knowledge needed - just your gumption. Signum City simulates the real-life stock market in real-time to experience what it’s like to trade stock in some of your favorite companies. As if that wasn't cool enough, you'll even have a chance to win real prizes as your stock savvy increases. It is well-documented that Gen Z knows the importance of financial literacy but still has a lot of anxiety surrounding attaining it. We gamify the stock market to empower a generation that deeply desires it. Players use fake money to trade stocks and build a portfolio using real world data, compete in sponsored tournaments with friends to win real gift cards, and learn financial literacy through completing levels within the game. In the fintech space, they open a competitor app and just see numbers and charts; we provide context. In the classroom space, the current offerings are dry and outdated; we provide gamification. Signum City offers Gen Z & Millenials a space to build both their financial literacy and their confidence with money.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Apps, Education, Financial Services, Gaming, Mobile, Software

Description: JNap Group provides automobile dealership management consulting and training services.
Full Description: My experience starts back in the accounting office of a Cadillac store. As a CPA from a large accounting firm, I was brought in to learn the car business from the accounting side. I was an A/P clerk, biller, office manager, controller and CFO. As a controller I was paired up with a GM to run the day to day operations of an auto mall with four franchises. Later as a CFO, the vice president and I ran the day to day operations of nine franchises in Chicago. During these seventeen years, I became involved in buy/sells, advertising, HR, bank relations, factory relations, legal, contracts and selling processes. During this time I would educate and train all department heads on the financial statement and forecasting. Due to the retirement of the dealer, I became the vice-president/GM of a single point Chrysler Jeep Dodge Ram store. I was involved with the entire process of opening a new store. From getting factory approval, naming the store, website design and hiring all personnel. The dealer lived 1500 miles from store so I was the operator. While the VP, I learned the used car business by attending auctions and buying and selling vehicles, displaying vehicles on the lot and setting up a photo studio on the premise for high quality pictures. Additionally I spent most mornings on the service drive to improve service writer performance and customer satisfaction. Lastly I implemented a menu system in F&I that improved the dollars per unit by $250 and started a BDC. After about five years as the VP, I took on the largest challenge of my professional career. I moved across country to Las Vegas and became the GM of Towbin Dodge. During my first full year, 2013, I took them to the number one Dodge volume store in the country. The first time Towbin Dodge has accomplished that feat. Additionally in the same year, Towbin Dodge won the Walter P. Chrysler award only given to the top 25 CJDR dealers annually. Not only does it require sales volume, you also need market share, great service department and very high CSI. All were accomplished.
Headquarters Regions: Western US
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Professional Services

Description: Lens is solving the biggest problem of the internet, large tech companies taking your information and irresponsibly sharing it.
Full Description: Lens believes that you should be able to Free Your Data and have it work for you.  The current model of sharing personal data is broken. Consumers are not in control of their data and the cost and burden of data management for the Enterprise is expensive and highly inaccurate leading to poor business decisions.  We are flipping the model.  The Lens Network will allow the Enterprise to subscribe directly to a Consumer's data putting the consumer in control of what data is shared, for how long, and providing insight to which companies have access to the data. Anytime a consumer changes their personal information the change will automatically be reflected in the Enterprise's backend systems leading to 100% accurate data all the time. We invite you on our journey to make a change that will be better for everyone by visiting www.mylens.io.
Headquarters Regions: Western US

Description: Professional social network for the creator economy
Full Description: Overview Creatorland is an innovative professional networking platform designed specifically for the burgeoning creator economy. Launched in 2023, our platform uniquely caters to content creators, influencers, brands, agencies, and talent managers, fostering a dynamic ecosystem for collaboration, growth, and opportunity. Mission Our mission is to empower creators and professionals in the creative sector by providing a comprehensive suite of tools and resources. Creatorland bridges the gap between talent and opportunity, enabling creators to showcase their work, connect with peers and industry leaders, and access a wealth of career-enhancing opportunities. Key Features Projects & Highlights: A robust feature set allowing creators to showcase their portfolio with detailed case studies and highlight notable achievements, enhancing their visibility and hireability. Analytics Dashboard: Integrated analytics for platforms like TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube, providing creators with valuable insights to optimize their content and engagement strategies. Mutual Connections: A networking feature that reveals connections between members, enhancing the ability to discover and forge meaningful professional relationships. Customizable Profiles: Comprehensive profile options including tags for skills, interests, and collaboration preferences, making it easier for brands and agencies to find the right creative talent. Creator Catalog: A searchable directory of creators, enabling targeted discovery based on specific criteria such as expertise, content type, and location. Impact and Growth Since its inception, Creatorland has rapidly grown, attracting thousands of members from across the globe. Our platform has become a go-to destination for creators seeking to professionalize their craft, network with peers, and access new opportunities. With a focus on innovation and community, Creatorland is at the forefront of reshaping the landscape of the creator economy. Vision for the Future Creatorland is committed to continuous evolution, adapting to the ever-changing needs of the creator economy. Our vision is to not only be a platform for connection and showcase but also a catalyst for the growth and success of every member of our creative community.

Description: The Easiest Way to Create, Manage and Sell NFTs.
Full Description: NiftyKit provides simple tools for creators, brands, and businesses to get started with NFTs and smart contracts. No experience with blockchain or crypto required. NiftyKit, a SaaS platform for artists to mint, list, and sell digital collectibles without needing knowledge about blockchain or crypto is helping creators get over the technical hurdles of minting their first NFT. The application provides simple tools for artists to mint NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) on either the Ethereum or Polygon blockchain. Started in 2020, NiftyKit is more than just a creator studio and marketplace for NFTs.  As a SaaS platform and subscription-based service, NiftyKit empowers creators to unlock new economic opportunities and build community by making it easy to create, manage, and sell NFTs. In addition, the platform is providing a solutions-oriented approach to deconstructing the confusing and often divisive nature of the blockchain. NiftyKit’s creator-focused mission includes tools to customize and create your custom branded tokens in minutes, not days. Creators can purchase a monthly subscription that allows creators to mint, manage, buy and sell directly through the platform with a simple, fiat-based experience. Not needing cryptocurrency to mint your first NFT increases accessibility and helps artists harness the opportunity of the NFT space with ease. NiftyKit is free for creators to sign up and try. Monthly subscriptions can be purchased starting as low as $9.99 and each plan offers unlimited NFT minting on Polygon, customizable smart contracts add-ons, and other tools to help creators launch unique experiences that build community, generate more leads, and close more sales.
Headquarters Regions: Greater San Diego Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Apps, Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Commerce and Shopping, Financial Services, Information Technology, Internet Services, Payments, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: Back Forty Beverage provides contract production of alcoholic beverages.
Full Description: In the Midwest, the “Back Forty” is a term used for the most remote section of a farm. The phrase dates back to the 1860s; when, via the Homestead Acts, farmers were granted 160 acres, subdivided into four sections of 40 acres each: two front forty and two back forty. If a farmer didn’t want to be found, he was probably somewhere out on the back forty. While spirits and beer have come a long way since those days, they’re still an agricultural product. Back Forty Beverage brings a little bit of that farming spirit every day. Back Forty Beverage is located in Clackamas, Oregon. Back Forty Beverage's business is built around the contract production of alcoholic beverages. The company's approach is a simple one: provide top-quality products for craft distilleries, breweries, wineries, cideries, restaurants, and distributors who need a reliable, full-service contract beverage manufacturer.

Description: CBTBE is a group of local business and community leaders that is actively exploring the creation of a new ‘community’ bank.
Full Description: Nashua is New Hampshire’s second largest city with a vibrant and growing economy, yet not one financial institution is headquartered here. Many retail customers, and particularly small and medium-sized business owners and professionals have experienced great difficulty obtaining capital and/or personalized service from the financial institutions that operate here. They truly “feel like a number” without a financial partner that takes time to know them or care about their success. CBTBE is a group of local business and community leaders that is actively exploring the creation of a new ‘community’ bank – one that is based in Nashua, is independent, locally-owned and managed, and where decisions are made locally by people who get to know their customers, rather than by someone outside the region, or the state. CBTBE’s vision is to create a boutique bank that will offer a complete suite of traditional loan and deposit services, with an emphasis on personalized customer service. First and foremost, they will work to establish personal, longstanding relationships with their customers.  At the same time, they will leverage the latest in e-commerce and mobile-banking technology to maximize accessibility and convenience for all customers. They will focus on loan transactions of $3 million or less to keep their emphasis firmly on serving small to medium-sized businesses and other customers in Southern New Hampshire.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, New England, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Other

Description: Energea connects investors to premium renewable energy projects in order to accelerate renewable energy development.
Full Description: Energea connects investors to premium renewable energy projects in order to accelerate renewable energy development in select global markets. Traditionally, these opportunities have been reserved for institutional financiers, but there is a significant opportunity to bring renewable energy investing to the masses as the effects of global warming intensify, the cost of renewable energy declines and traditional investment classes suffer from over-participation and value instability. While projects on the Energea platform may be originated by Energea itself or a network of qualified renewable project developers who specialize in specific countries, every project is meticulously screened and underwritten by our in-house team and a deep bench of third party experts who provide certain legal, technical and accounting analysis. The Energea team has the international, project development, financial and IT experience to execute in this role. Energea’s team is comprised of exceptionally hard-working and experienced people who are motivated to make an impact against climate change and the challenge of rebuilding the world’s energy infrastructure. The diverse skills that form our investment committee ensure that we analyze risk from multiple perspectives while our leadership team provides nearly unmatched experience with this asset class.

Description: Nesh is an enterprise answer engine that lets you talk to your data. Unlike search engines that provide links, Nesh gives you answers.
Full Description: For enterprises that work with a lot of 'unstructured' data like documents, presentations, emails, and webpages, a mash-up of existing search tools provides endless, irrelevant links and no answers, Nesh is the solution. Nesh is like a combination of Google’s search, IBM Watson’s domain understanding, and Alexa’s conversations tailored for your industry, based on your company. Nesh can connect to publicly and privately available data, quickly, safely, and easily.

Description: Chat Data is a versatile platform for building AI chatbots for websites with a flexiblw way of backend integration.
Full Description: Chat Data is a platform that allows you to create AI chatbots, which can be embedded ias a chat widget to your website. You can choose from any of the 3 following ways to create your AI chatbot basd on your needs: 1. Tailor your chatbot by providing customized documents (.pdf, docs, html, txt), website links, plaintext, or Q&As for training purposes. This option encompasses all the functionalities offered by other competitors' chatbots. 2. Opt for our pre-trained chatbot models, such as our Medical Chat models for Human and Veterinary use. These models are meticulously trained using professional articles and datasources, currently serving over 3000 users. 3. If data privacy is a concern, and you've already trained a custom model, opt for our convenient chatbot widget. Seamlessly integrate your custom backend endpoint into our chatbot UI, enabling easy embedding anywhere on the Internet. Benefit from the embeddability and user analysis features offered by our platform without sharing your data. In addition to versatile backend integration, our chatbot provides a range of additional functionalities. These include: 1. Customize the chatbot UI interface with remarkable flexibility. 2. Safeguard your chatbot from abusive use through rate-limiting protection. 3. Receive daily notifications about gathered customer data and conversations that occurred on the current day. 4. Choose to collect customer information directly within the chatbot. 5. Access user activity analysis and observe the geographic distribution of users interacting with your chatbot. 6. View and print all customer interactions and conversations within a specified date range. 7. Interact with the chatbot through various channels, such as on a website, via a full-screen public link, or using the chatbot widget on your website. In the near future, we will integrate  the chatbot with third-party software like Zapier, Slack, WordPress, WhatsApp, and more. 8. Engage with the chatbot through API calls; a comprehensive API guide is available at this (Link). 9. You can also viste Medical Chat to ask any healthcare related question and test the performance of our medical chat models.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Information Technology, Other, Professional Services, Sales and Marketing, Software

Our company is committed to development and commercialization of high-performance micro transducers and energy harvesters to address the needs of next generation energy-autonomous wireless sensors and IoT devices.    To enable manufacturing of high-performance and low-cost energy harvesters and other micro electromechanical systems, ActiveMEMS is developing new microfabrication technologies for wafer-scale heterogeneous integration of high-quality smart materials into microsystems. Our core technology platform enables advanced solutions for not only energy harvesters but also a wide range of other applications, from high-resolution ultrasound transceiver arrays for biomedical imaging to micro-speakers, microphones and haptic-feedback transducers for mobile consumer electronics.

Aerospace Technology Ventures was formed in 2019 with the joint venture of Avmosys and Airvel, due to a shared vision to solve problems within the Air Charter industry. Between the two companies, they  have decades worth of aviation and technology experience and are uniquely positioned to create solutions that connect the industry. Avmosys'​ roots go back to the early '80s where their board member Joe Moeggenberg's company Executive Jet Management was acquired by NetJets, a company that he was later President of. During this time, their CTO and EVP Mike Midkiff and Scott Liston worked with Joe to deliver technology solutions at NetJets that are still in use today. Joe, Mike and Scott left NetJets and eventually joined again at Argus International, a worldwide leader in specialized aviation services and created the Avmosys system in 2009 to be a comprehensive, cloud hosted and highly customizable flight operations platform.

Industries: Apps, EdTech, Education, Enterprise Software, Finance, Financial Services, FinTech, Personal Development, Software
Description: Troutwood develops financial planning and investment education software applications and web based tools for individuals and institutions.
Full Description: Own Your Financial Future. Not everyone grows up with a Wall Street Journal on the kitchen table. Troutwood seeks to close the "Wealth Gap" by providing software that empowers individuals to learn how to build, implement, and successfully execute a plan to achieve financial freedom. Recognizing that personal finance is personal, Troutwood combines cutting edge research with proprietary AI and ML to understand each user's unique persona and behavioral biases which may influence their decisions, how they learn best, and respond with the right engagement at the right time. Committed to being "jargon-free", educational content is delivered via "Finglish", Troutwood's proprietary "Finance-to-English" learning modules, which breakdown complex ideas into bite-sized explainers anyone can understand. Built for the 99% who may not have an advisor, but who still seek help with decisions about money, Troutwood puts the knowledge and modeling power of an MBA/CFA/finance professor into a user's pocket. Founded out of Carnegie Mellon University's Swartz Center for Entrepreneurship, Troutwood draws upon the founders' deep experience working with some of the world's largest and most sophisticated institutional investors, teaching at the collegiate level, working one-on-one with low-income students and families, collaborating with behavioral finance experts, and working with some of the nation's pre-eminent financial literacy non-profits.  100% conflict-free, and committed to ethical use of data, Troutwood is not a broker-dealer or RIA and always puts users first, providing an alignment of interest and credibility that is rare in the FinTech industry. Ready to meet the needs of teachers and schools seeking to provide personal finance education, Troutwood delivers a true "super-app" at the intersection of EdTech and FinTech. Rooted in the experience of more than 1,000 classroom visits and workshops all across the country, the free-tier of software meets or far exceeds national standards in financial literacy education. Every student user is able to Explore Career paths, Explore Colleges and Trade Schools, Set Goals, Create a Budget, Create a Plan, and access a broad array of tools, games, eBooks, quizzes, and content - all carefully vetted and built by institutional finance professionals. For non-student / working adults, Troutwood offers the ability to not only create a plan and learn about personal finance, but to monitor finances and track actual performance vs. plan benchmarks, for both budget and net worth, via manual entry or open-finance linked accounts. Proprietary financial modeling, forecasting, and decision tools - the like of which have never been available in consumer software - help users learn to maximize opportunities, avoid major money mistakes, stay accountable, and gain confidence.   Additional SaaS/Enterprise offerings are available to schools, non-profits, and corporations committed to advancing financial education and empowerment for their constituents or employees. Troutwood gives individuals, and the institutions who care about them, a way to take holistic financial well-being to the next level.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Apps, Education, Financial Services, Software
Founders: Gene Natali, Jeff Davidek, Yazid Hamdi

Description: AI-Powered Connected Vehicle Data Platform
Full Description: CerebrumX, headquartered in Princeton, NJ, USA and with offices across NA, EMEA and APAC, provides a ubiquitous AI-powered data management platform spread across the Edge and Core Network to our partners (OEMs, Media, Insurers, Fleet Companies, Smart Cities/Municipalities etc.) to enable the activation of connected vehicle data that is yet un-utilized to any significant level due to the absence to the right Automotive Ecosystem.  Our proprietary Advanced Deep Learning Platform (ADLP) unlocks the true power of connected vehicle data from millions of connected vehicles in real time, to generate AI-driven insights that support business innovation. A trusted and neutral source of data-based insights augmented with Social, Location, Weather and Mobility data, ADLP drives future-defining business decisions in today’s dynamic ecosystem. With easy-to-use Development Interface though open APIs and seamless cloud integration, CerebrumX allows Consumers to build their customized business use cases by leveraging the power and scope of vehicle data.  ADLP provides a plug-in to manage and maintain Data Privacy, Anonymization and Consent Management at the source, to ensure that any personal information is treated based on the user consent. CerebrumX takes pride in bringing privacy to everything it does, going beyond just compliance with its white-label app and web solution, CerebrumX Secure Consent. By giving the control back to the drivers, over the sharing of their connected vehicle data, CerebrumX Secure Consent maintains transparent, ethical as well as GDPR and CCPA complaint data sharing.  Auto businesses utilize AI-powered insights from CerebrumX to redefine fleet management, auto insurance, develop future-proof maintenance and warranty solutions. They innovate value-driven solutions to aid traffic management, parking solutions and make way for a greener, electrified and sustainable future.

Approach Partner Businesses are restaurants, bars, coffee shops, ice cream parlors, and other businesses that have subscribed to be listed as a first date meetup location within the Approach app and can offer specials to users. For safety, when users meet in person at the business, they show an employee their Approach coupon to notify the staff that they’re there on a first date and to redeem the business' special. This approach to online dating–connecting in person first–is what differentiates Approach from our competitors.

Description: Medical Practice Support
Full Description: PrescriberPoint is “Kayak” for prescribers looking for an easier, one-stop-shop way to get their patients on therapy who may be facing complex coverage, affordability and patient start challenges.  We are disrupting the $100Bn+ the pharma industry spends on healthcare providers (HCPs) which includes HCP marketing, field teams and hub-services. Our goal is to build an alternative to these fragmented, pharma-centric solutions with an HCP-centric, aggregation-based approach. Our marketplace platform aggregates all the resources HCPs need for the over 35k marketed drugs in the US to look up and evaluate a drug, research and find coverage and affordability options for patients, order samples and take other actions to get patients started on therapy.  Our AI and software tools provide decision-support and workflow automation to cut down on the two days a week doctors offices report they spend dealing with these bureaucratic challenges.  As a “connector” platform, like other aggregators like Kayak, Zillow and Cars.com, we are making it easy for HCPs to tap into other solutions across the prescribing journey that can help facilitate patient starts such as RTBI, ePA and pharmacy offerings. Our solution is free for HCPs. Our business model relies on charging pharma brands a monthly subscription fee for premium services designed to help targeted HCPs take advantage of the content, tools and services offered through the brand’s PrescriberPoint “microsite”.

Industry Groups: Health Care

It enables companies to scale, automate, and manage their M365 environments more efficiently. With its friendly user interface, Simeon Cloud empowers companies to easily manage configuration as code, establish baseline configurations for multiple tenants, deploy non-production environments, monitor and document drift, and back up and recover configurations.

Description: We're a community for entrepreneurial ecosystems; enabling our members to create new and impactful strategic relationships across the globe.
Full Description: OmniValley is an online social community for those looking to establish the right connections within entrepreneurial ecosystems. We’ve built the online platform as defined by our mission: to grow and cultivate a social community for entrepreneurial ecosystems enabling our members to create new and impactful strategic relationships across the globe. Startup epicenters like Silicon Valley, Boston, and New York continue to thrive as the dominant areas to be in or to look at if interested in tapping into the startup and venture space. While OmniValley focuses on connecting both large and small markets, we strive to create a single, decentralized entrepreneurial world. Our core belief is that talent and innovation can and do reside everywhere; there needs to be a better way to showcase and introduce all of it no matter where those connecting may be. OmniValley’s platform makes it both possible and simple to source, connect, and develop meaningful relationships with those members operating within entrepreneurial ecosystems across the globe. Please reach out should you want to learn about how the many others are working with OmniValley - we're happy to speak with you. info@ominvalley.co  |  join@omnivalley.co
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Internet Services, Lending and Investments

Description: Ahrvo Comply enables Intelligent Identity, Document, Transaction, and Data Management.
Full Description: Ahrvo Comply is a cloud-based solution that empowers financial organizations of varying sizes and complexities to streamline customer and business onboarding and life-cycle management through user-friendly compliance and business solutions that are powered by facial biometrics, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technology. Ahrvo Comply has four main pillars – Identity Management (Know Your Customer, Know Your Business, Anti-Money Laundering), Document Management (Document OCR, File Sharing, E-Signature, PDF Editor), Transaction Management (Transaction Monitoring/Screening, Suspicious Activity Reporting, Anomaly Detection), Data Management (WORM Storage – Smart Contracts, Blockchain). Ahrvo Comply’s extensive geospatial/location and AML databases are overlaid with deep learning algorithms to detect and thwart nefarious actors and transactions before they become a threat.
Headquarters Regions: Western US
Industry Groups: Apps, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Information Technology, Internet Services, Lending and Investments, Mobile, Other, Science and Engineering, Software
